# @konstructio/ui - React Component Library

> A set of reusable and customizable React components built for konstruct.io infrastructure products.

## Quick Start

```bash
npm install @konstructio/ui
```

```tsx
import { Button, Input, Modal } from '@konstructio/ui';
import { ThemeProvider } from '@konstructio/ui';

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme="kubefirst">
      <Button variant="primary">Click me</Button>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
}
```

## Tailwind CSS Setup Required

```ts
// tailwind.config.ts
import { konstructPlugin } from '@konstructio/ui';

export default {
  content: [
    './node_modules/@konstructio/ui/dist/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}',
  ],
  plugins: [konstructPlugin],
};
```

## Components

### Buttons
- `Button` - variant: primary | secondary | tertiary | danger | link

### Form Inputs
- `Input` - Text input with label, error, helperText props
- `TextArea` - Multiline text
- `Select` / `Dropdown` - Dropdown select
- `Checkbox` - Checkbox with label
- `Switch` - Toggle switch
- `Radio`, `RadioGroup` - Radio buttons
- `RadioCard`, `RadioCardGroup` - Card-style radios
- `Counter` / `NumberInput` - Numeric +/- input
- `Datepicker` - Date selection
- `TimePicker` - Time selection
- `PhoneNumberInput` - International phone
- `Slider`, `Range` - Slider inputs
- `Autocomplete` - Search suggestions
- `MultiSelectDropdown` - Multi-select
- `TagSelect` - Tag selection
- `ImageUpload` - Image upload

### Feedback
- `Alert` - Alert messages
- `AlertDialog` - Confirmation dialogs
- `Modal` - Modal dialogs
- `Toast` - Toast notifications
- `Tooltip` - Hover tooltips
- `Loading` - Loading states
- `ProgressBar` - Progress indicator

### Navigation
- `Tabs` - Tab navigation
- `Breadcrumb` - Breadcrumbs
- `Sidebar` - Navigation sidebar
- `DropdownButton` - Button with dropdown

### Data Display
- `Table` - Data table
- `VirtualizedTable` - Large dataset table
- `PieChart` - Pie charts
- `Badge` - Status badges
- `Tag` - Tags/chips
- `Card` - Container card
- `Typography` - Text styles

### Other
- `Divider` - Visual separator
- `Command` - Command palette

## Theme System

```tsx
import { ThemeProvider, useTheme } from '@konstructio/ui';

// Available themes: 'kubefirst' | 'light' | 'kubefirst-dark' | 'dark'
<ThemeProvider theme="kubefirst">
  <App />
</ThemeProvider>

// Access theme in components
const { theme, setTheme } = useTheme();
```

## Common Props

Most components accept:
- `theme` - Override theme for component
- `className` - Additional CSS classes
- `disabled` - Disable component

Form components also accept:
- `label` - Input label
- `error` - Error message
- `helperText` - Helper text
- `isRequired` - Show required indicator

## Button Variants

```tsx
<Button variant="primary">Primary</Button>
<Button variant="secondary">Secondary</Button>
<Button variant="tertiary">Tertiary</Button>
<Button variant="danger">Danger</Button>
<Button variant="link">Link</Button>
<Button shape="circle" size="large"><Icon /></Button>
<Button appearance="compact">Compact</Button>
```

## Input Example

```tsx
<Input
  label="Email"
  placeholder="Enter email"
  error="Invalid email"
  helperText="We'll never share your email"
  isRequired
/>
```

## Modal Example

```tsx
import { Modal, Button } from '@konstructio/ui';

<Modal>
  <Modal.Trigger asChild>
    <Button>Open Modal</Button>
  </Modal.Trigger>
  <Modal.Content>
    <Modal.Header>
      <Modal.Title>Title</Modal.Title>
    </Modal.Header>
    <Modal.Body>Content here</Modal.Body>
    <Modal.Footer>
      <Modal.Close asChild>
        <Button variant="secondary">Cancel</Button>
      </Modal.Close>
    </Modal.Footer>
  </Modal.Content>
</Modal>
```

## Table Example

```tsx
import { Table } from '@konstructio/ui';

const columns = [
  { accessorKey: 'name', header: 'Name' },
  { accessorKey: 'email', header: 'Email' },
];

<Table columns={columns} data={users} />
```

## Utilities

```tsx
import { cn } from '@konstructio/ui';

// Merge Tailwind classes safely
<div className={cn('base-class', condition && 'conditional-class')} />
```
